synopsis.text: Tezukaâ€™s stop motion masterpiece, led by Kihachiro Kawamoto, presents a whimsical and thought-provoking exploration of the eternal struggle between creator and creation. As the artist meticulously shapes a stunning sculpture from a simple lump of clay, the creation springs to life with a rebellious spirit. The once-docile clay figure seeks to reshape its own creator, sparking a humorous and timeless battle of wills. Originally conceived as part of an international challenge for animated self-portraits, this engaging short film showcases the unexpected consequences when artistic vision clashes with the desires of the created.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
